price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߋ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߝߎ߬ߝߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߞߊ߬ߙߏ߲ ߡߊ߬ ) ، ߞߏߘߏ߲߰ߣߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߟߐ߲ߓߊ߯ߓߊ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
